mapper.insert: insert into member_order_info (order_number, phone_no, type, validityDurationType, amount, status, create_time, modify_time) values (#{orderNumber}, #{phoneNo}, #{type}, #{validityDurationType}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime})
mapper.select: select phone_no phoneNo, type, validityDurationType, amount, status from member_order_info where order_number= #{out_trade_no}
